mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (uid, upw, uname, email, birthdate, joindate, gender, profile_picture, filesrc, profile_content) values (#{uid}, #{upw}, #{uname}, #{email}, #{birthdate}, #{joindate}, #{gender}, #{profile_picture}, #{filesrc}, #{profile_content})
mapper.select: select count(uid) from tbl_member where uid=#{uid}
select count(uname) from tbl_member where uname=#{uname}
select count(usernick) from tbl_board left join tbl_member on tbl_member.uname = tbl_board.usernick where tbl_board.usernick = #{uname};
select count(replyer) from tbl_reply left join tbl_member on tbl_member.uname = tbl_reply.replyer where tbl_reply.replyer = #{uname};
select point from tbl_member_point left join tbl_member on tbl_member.uid = tbl_member_point.uid where tbl_member.uname = #{uname};
mapper.delete: delete from t1 using tbl_point_log as t1 join tbl_member as t2 on t1.uid = t2.uid where t2.uname = #{uname};
delete from t1 using tbl_member_point as t1 join tbl_member as t2 on t1.uid = t2.uid where t2.uname = #{uname};
delete from t1 using tbl_member_authority as t1 join tbl_member as t2 on t1.uid = t2.uid where t2.uname = #{uname};
mapper.select: select uid from tbl_member where email = #{email};
select uid from tbl_member where uid = #{uid} and email = #{email};
mapper.update: update tbl_member set upw=#{encodePwd} where uid=#{uid};
